alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:43AM PST until January 05 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches, except 9 to 19 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph through this evening. Most of the accumulating snow will occur this afternoon and evening, and again Tuesday night. * WHERE...Baker County zone. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing and drifting snow may result in continuously covered roads this afternoon and evening, and snow will blow back on to the roads very soon after they are plowed.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
